tasks.label: Start Local Development Server
args: if (Get-Command live-server -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { live-server --port=3000 --entry-file=index.html --open=/index.html } else { Write-Host 'Installing live-server...'; npm install -g live-server; live-server --port=3000 --entry-file=index.html --open=/index.html }
